thread.title: Jennifer Lopez Doesn’t Want To Live In Beverly Hills Mansion She Shared With Ben Affleck, Puts On Market For $68 Million
thread.title_full: Jennifer Lopez Doesn’t Want To Live In Beverly Hills Mansion She Shared With Ben Affleck, Puts On Market For $68 Million

author: Ava Lombardi
title: Jennifer Lopez Doesn’t Want To Live In Beverly Hills Mansion She Shared With Ben Affleck, Puts On Market For $68 Million
text:
Following her split from Ben Affleck , Jennifer Lopez is no longer comfortable living in the mansion she once shared with him.
Lopez and Affleck tied the knot in July 2022 and purchased the $60.8 million Beverly Hills mansion the following May. They resided there with Lopez’s 16-year-old twins, Max and Emme , and Affleck’s three children, Violet , 18, Seraphina , 15, and Samuel , 12.
Rumors of the couple’s divorce started in May 2024, and Affleck moved out of the mansion and into a $20.5 Los Angeles home shortly after.
Now, Lopez reportedy doesn’t feel right living in the house alone.
The home is listed on Zillow for $68 million. The 38,000-square-foot estate features 12 bedrooms and 24 bathrooms. It has a zero-edge pool, a gym, a boxing ring, basketball and pickleball courts and a caretaker house. The driveway can accommodate 80 vehicles, in addition to the 12-car garage attached to the house.
Lopez officially filed for divorce from the actor on April 26 and requested to drop Affleck’s last name in July.
Earlier this week, Affleck was spotted on a date with Robert F. Kennedy Jr. ‘s daughter, Kick Kennedy .
